td.content: s:a male entrepreneur aged 56 years presents with progressive moderate nocturia times two, moderate elevated psa of 5.8, moderate gradual 'slowing down' feeling and Cancer for past 6 weeks. he drinks alcohol occasionally Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 192 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Prostate Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed bicalutamide - 50 mg daily, and ordered PSA Panel.

s:a 57 YO m entrepreneur complains of moderate elevated psa of 5.8, moderate nocturia times two and moderate gradual 'slowing down' feeling and other medical problems. NKDA. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 53 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Prostate Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:patient says he is having symptoms of moderate elevated psa of 5.8 8-9 times a week, mostly during the day. pt is a male entrepreneur aged 57 years. he reports having no more than one drink a day he denies smoking o:Height 191 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Prostate Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed bicalutamide - 50 mg daily, and ordered Temporary HDR brachytherapy - prostate.
